name: Monster Match
description:
Which of the 16 monsters from Monster Garden is your monster match?! Take this five minute visual novel quiz to find out!

You can also play Monster Match in your browser: http://wzackw.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/MonsterMatch/

If you like the style of Monster Match, you might love getting to know the monsters better in Monster Garden: https://wzackw.itch.io/monster-garden
